actions.text: Amendment SA 307 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 53. Record Vote Number: 67.

Amendment SA 307 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Thune. (consideration: CR S2283-2292; text: CR S2283) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund to permanently eliminate the Federal estate tax.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 307 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 53. Record Vote Number: 67.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 307 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 46 - 53. Record Vote Number: 67.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 307 proposed by Senator Murray for Senator Thune.

purpose: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund to permanently eliminate the Federal estate tax.
